text: (visvasavantayini! khella kapana avasthavedi) allahge namaya kiyanu nolÃ¦bu dÃ¦ya oba aharayata noganu. niyata vasayenma eya visala papayaki. (mehi) oba samaga tarka karana men niyata vasayenma seyitanvaru tamange mituranva polambavannaha. oba ovunta avanata vuvahot niyata vasayenma obat (ovun men) samanayan taba namadinneki
